Using Address Validation

As a call

With the javautil-address-validation jar file in the classpath validation can be effected very easily.

See the Unit Test

Batch Mode

Batch Mode processing takes is for bulk processing. Data may be read from a database or flat files (Comma Separated Values) and the results are persisted.
